pkgmetadata.longdescription: # dgbowl-schemas## Schemas and validators for the `dgbowl` suite of tools.Currently implemented schemas are:- `recipe` validator for `dgpost` at version `{2.0, 1.1, 1.0}`- `dataschema` validator for `yadg`, versions `{5.0, 4.2, 4.1, 4.0}`- `payload` validator for `tomato` at version `{0.2, 0.1}`
